oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural systems research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lockeretz, W
Boehncke, E
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Systems research and participatory research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contents: Just what do we mean by "systems", and how can we understand them? Why is systems research particularly suited to organic agriculture? How do we do it? A way to start Achieving true systems research: a long-range goal
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lockeretz, W and Boehncke, E (2000) Agricultural systems research. In: Hovi, M and Trujillo, R G (Eds.) Diversity of livestock systems and definition of animal welfare, pp. 5-15.
